page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT FACILITIES
page.content:
The{provision of entertainment} facilities in Kinglassie is to say the least{very limited for young {people. }
A{new community hall}has been built behind Kinglassie Primary School and this represents the only major community facility where people can meet and take part in club activities. Initial enthusiasm for the new hall has since declined and there is very little in the way of sports or social club activities in the village.
A{youth club}does run twice a week but again facilities are very limited.
Older people in the village are better provided for with an{old folks club} which organises bowling afternoons and social activities.
